title: How to Make Oatmeal Scones

steps.headline: Melt the butter and honey together and mix them into the oatmeal.
Mix the milk into the oatmeal mixture.
Stir together the flour, baking powder, and salt.
Stir the flour mixture into the oatmeal mixture.
steps.description: Add a little more flour if the dough is too moist. The dough should form a rough ball.

steps.headline: Roll the dough out to 1" (2.5 cm) thick and cut it into wedges.
Sprinkle sugar on top of the scones.
Bake the dough wedges on a greased baking sheet for 15-20 minutes.

text: Preheat oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Melt the butter and honey together and mix them into the oatmeal.  Mix the milk into the oatmeal mixture.  Stir together the flour, baking powder, and salt.  Stir the flour mixture into the oatmeal mixture. Add a little more flour if the dough is too moist. The dough should form a rough ball. Roll the dough out to 1" (2.5 cm) thick and cut it into wedges.  Sprinkle sugar on top of the scones.  Bake the dough wedges on a greased baking sheet for 15-20 minutes.  Finished.
